rev.diff:
Line 60: Line 60:
* Gotham was also used for the popular ''I'm With Coco'' posters during [[Conan O'Brien]]'s [[2010 Tonight Show conflict]]. The font was eventually adopted for [[TBS (TV channel)|TBS]]'s ''[[Conan (TV series)|Conan]]'' logo.
* Gotham was also used for the popular ''I'm With Coco'' posters during [[Conan O'Brien]]'s [[2010 Tonight Show conflict]]. The font was eventually adopted for [[TBS (TV channel)|TBS]]'s ''[[Conan (TV series)|Conan]]'' logo.
â
[[File:United_Airlines_2010_logo.svg|150px|right|thumb|The logo of [[United Continental Holdings]]]]
 
A customized version of Gotham is the font used for the new logo of [[United Continental Holdings]], replacing the previous font of [[Continental Airlines]], called [[Perpetua (typeface)|Monotype Perpetua]] and the corporate font of [[United Airlines]].
A customized version of Gotham is the font used for the new logo of [[United Continental Holdings]], replacing the previous font of [[Continental Airlines]], called [[Perpetua (typeface)|Monotype Perpetua]] and the corporate font of [[United Airlines]].
